short_description: crown cement is an asphalt & paving products company based in munshiganj, bangladesh.
long_description: cement factory ltd., the parent company of crown cement group, is one of the leading manufacturers of cement in bangladesh. cement factory ltd. is a public limited company that commenced its adventurous journey in bangladesh with the dedication of providing high quality cement to the country on december 31, 1994. the company has been listed on dhaka and chittagong bourses in 2011 through initial public offering (ipo) by using the "book-building" method in an effort to make a contribution to the development of the capital market. its high growth agenda have highly been appreciated by the shareholders and have won the investors' confidence. the company's backward and forward integration endeavors have given new dimensions to its growth platform. with this end in view, the associate industrial units such as crown polymers bagging ltd., crown power generation ltd., crown mariners ltd., crown maritime & shipping services ltd., crown transportation & logistics ltd. and crown cement concrete & building materials ltd. have been set up and are in operation.

generated_description: crown cement, legally known as crown cement plc., based in dhaka, bangladesh, is a leading manufacturer of cement. established in 1994, the company is a public limited company and a subsidiary of crown cement group. crown cement plc produces a range of cement products, including portland cement (pc) and portland composite cement (pcc), as well as ready mix concrete. the company is known for its commitment to high-quality products and has been recognized for its export achievements, including winning the national export trophy.
